ivardefs.name: action_
ivardefs.desc: An action or group of actions to be taken as part of the plan.

ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: author_
ivardefs.desc: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the plan definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the plan definition.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the plan definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the plan definition

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the plan definition from a consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: editor_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the plan definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

ivardefs.name: endorser_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

ivardefs.name: experimental
ivardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this plan definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

ivardefs.name: goal_
ivardefs.desc: Goals that describe what the activities within the plan are intended to achieve. For example, weight loss, restoring an activity of daily living, obtaining herd immunity via immunization, meeting a process improvement objective, etc.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this plan definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the plan definition is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: library_
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the plan definition.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the plan definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the plan definition.

ivardefs.name: purpose
ivardefs.desc: Explanation of why this plan definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

ivardefs.name: relatedArtifact_
ivardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

ivardefs.name: reviewer_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of this plan definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

ivardefs.name: subtitle
ivardefs.desc: An explanatory or alternate title for the plan definition giving additional information about its content.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the plan definition.

ivardefs.name: topic_
ivardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the plan definition. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the definition that can be useful for filtering and searching.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: A high-level category for the plan definition that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the plan definition.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this plan definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which an

ivardefs.name: usage
ivardefs.desc: A detailed description of how the plan definition is used from a clinical perspective.

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the plan definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the plan definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. Fo

properties.desc: This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact. The resource is general enough to support the description of a broad range of clinical artifacts such as clinical decision support rules,
